Council and committee meetings

Listen
  • Share on Facebook
  • Share on Twitter
  • Print

On this page

  • Council meetings
  • Services Delegated Committee meetings
  • Urban Planning Delegated Committee meetings
  • How to watch the meetings
  • Upcoming meetings and agendas

Our decision-making takes place in 3 formal forums.

Council meetings

Council meetings are the formal decision-making forum for all matters under Council's area of authority according to law or other regulations. Meetings are chaired by the Mayor and are attended by all Councillors.

Services Delegated Committee meetings

The Services Delegated Committee deals with reports on issues such as traffic management, road closures, parking, family and children’s services, and youth services.

All Councillors are members of the committee. Cr Nick Stavrou is the Chair of the Services Delegated Committee.

Council has given certain powers to the Services Delegated Committee through an instrument of delegation.

Read our Instrument of Delegation to the Services Delegated Committee

  Instrument of Delegation to the Services Delegated Committee 57.54 KB [PDF] 31 August 2021

Urban Planning Delegated Committee meetings

The Urban Planning Delegated Committee deals with reports on issues relating to the Planning and Environment Act 1987 and the Building Act 1990.

All Councillors are members of the committee. Cr Wes Gault is Chair of the Urban Planning Delegated Committee.

Council has given certain powers to the Urban Planning Delegated Committee through an instrument of delegation.

Read our Instrument of Delegation to the Urban Planning Delegated Committee

  Instrument of Delegation to the Urban Planning Delegated Committee 55.34 KB [PDF] 31 August 2021

How to watch the meetings

You can watch live meetings and past meeting recordings on our Council and committee meetings playlist on the City of Boroondara YouTube channel. The list of meetings is ordered by date, with the most recent meetings at the top of the list. Copyright laws apply, for more information see our Copyright of video recordings section. 

You can find out more about how we run our meetings to make sure they are fair, orderly and effective, as well as how the Mayor is elected:

  • on our Governance Rules page
  • by watching our Council meetings explained video on YouTube. 

For more information about our meetings, call us on (03) 9278 4471.

Copyright of video recordings

Boroondara City Council (Council) owns the copyright in the recordings of Council meetings and all rights are reserved. This recording is provided by Council for personal and non-commercial viewing only. Other than for the purposes of and in accordance with the Copyright Act 1968 (Cth), this recording must not be copied, reproduced or communicated in whole or in part by any means without the express prior written permission of Council.

Smith Reserve and Patterson Reserve, Hawthorn - Proposed Roads discontinuances and Title consolidation project    7.4     Instrument of Delegation from Council to the Chief Executive Officer    7.5     Adoption of Election Period Policy    7.6     1326 to 1336 Toorak Road, Camberwell and 2 to 8 Charles Street and 1 Alfred Road, Glen Iris - Proposed discontinuance and sale of right of way (road)    7.7     Contract No. 2023/15 - Routine Maintenance of Essential Safety Measures and Lift Services    7.8     Contract Variations    7.9     Triennial Operational Grants 2023/26 - Additional Funding Allocation    Supplementary report    7.10    Contract No. 2023/136 - Vehicle Repair Services8    General business9    Urgent business10  Confidential business11  Close of meetingWatch the meetingYou can watch the Council meeting on the City of Boroondara YouTube channel  , City of Boroondara [email protected] Australia/Melbourne public

Event details

Order of Business

1    Adoption and confirmation of the minutes for the Council meeting held on 22 April 2024

2    Declaration of conflict of interest of any councillor or council officer

3    Deputations, presentations, petitions and public submissions

4    Informal Meetings of Councillors

5    Public question time

6    Notices of motion

7    Presentation of officer reports

    7.1     March 2024 Quarterly Performance Report

    7.2     Tree Protection Local Law 2024 - Consideration of adoption

    7.3     H.A. Smith Reserve and Patterson Reserve, Hawthorn - Proposed Roads discontinuances and Title consolidation project

    7.4     Instrument of Delegation from Council to the Chief Executive Officer

    7.5     Adoption of Election Period Policy

    7.6     1326 to 1336 Toorak Road, Camberwell and 2 to 8 Charles Street and 1 Alfred Road, Glen Iris - Proposed discontinuance and sale of right of way (road)

    7.7     Contract No. 2023/15 - Routine Maintenance of Essential Safety Measures and Lift Services

    7.8     Contract Variations

    7.9     Triennial Operational Grants 2023/26 - Additional Funding Allocation

    Supplementary report

    7.10    Contract No. 2023/136 - Vehicle Repair Services

8    General business

9    Urgent business

10  Confidential business

11  Close of meeting
